segments.text: What can I do to help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have some extra help with my project . What would you prefer to help me with , typing or xeroxing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could do some typing for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is very kind of you to offer to do that . Can you start with the pages on the table ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure I will get to do that right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like your positive attitude . How many years have you been employed here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have worked here long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a really interesting project coming up . Would you want to join us on it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure . Let me think about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will mention how great you were about helping me today . I appreciate your help .
segments.speaker: S2
